import React from 'react'; import Card, { CardHeader, CardBody, CardFooter, CardTitle, CardText, CardImage } from '../components/Card'; const CardDemoPage = () => { return (
{/* Page Header */}

Card Component Demo

A flexible and reusable Card component inspired by Bootstrap's card system. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and full customization support.

{/* Basic Card Examples */}

Basic Card Variants

{/* Default Card */} Default Card This is a basic card with default styling. Perfect for most use cases. {/* Primary Card */} Primary Card A primary variant with blue theming for important content. {/* Success Card */} Success Card Green variant for success messages and positive feedback. This one has hover effects!
{/* Advanced Examples */}

Advanced Examples

{/* Card with Image */} Beautiful Interior Design Transform your space with modern design principles. This card showcases how images can be seamlessly integrated with your content. Posted 2 hours ago
‚ù§Ô∏è 24 likes
{/* Profile Card */}
JD
John Doe Full Stack Developer at TechCorp Passionate about creating amazing user experiences and building scalable applications.
{/* Warning and Danger Cards */}

Alert Cards

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning This is a warning message. Please review your settings before proceeding. üö® Error Something went wrong. Please contact support if this issue persists.
{/* Customization Examples */}

Custom Styling

{/* Minimal Card */} Minimal Card Sometimes less is more. This card uses minimal styling with custom borders. {/* Gradient Card */} Gradient Magic Custom gradients can create stunning visual effects. {/* Large Shadow Card */} Interactive Card This card has custom hover animations and large shadows for depth.
{/* Feature List */}
Component Features

Variants

  • ‚úÖ Default, Primary, Success
  • ‚úÖ Warning, Danger, Dark
  • ‚úÖ Custom styling support

Components

  • ‚úÖ Card, CardHeader, CardBody
  • ‚úÖ CardFooter, CardTitle, CardText
  • ‚úÖ CardImage with positioning

Features

  • ‚úÖ Responsive design
  • ‚úÖ Hover effects
  • ‚úÖ Multiple shadow levels

Technical

  • ‚úÖ PropTypes validation
  • ‚úÖ Tailwind CSS + classnames
  • ‚úÖ Full customization
); }; export default CardDemoPage;
